greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle read by rows: T(n,k) = n!*Pell(n-k+1)/k!, where Pell(n)=A000129(n).
comment: The row polynomials form an Appell sequence (see Wikipedia). - _Tom Copeland_, Dec 03 2013.
formula: E.g.f. Sum T(n,k) x^n y^k / n! = e^{xy}/(1-2x-x^2). - Franklin T. Adams-Watters, Jan 12 2007
xref: Cf. A000129, A110328 (row sums), A110329 (diagonal sums), A110330 (matrix inverse).
results.author: _Paul Barry_, Jul 20 2005
